name: Tic-tac-toe
tagline: Basic Tic Tac Toe player and bot
body:
### Tic Tac Toe
This basic tic tac toe player just needs to be downloaded, compiled and run. The instructions are on screen, and allows for three modes of play:
1. Computer v Computer
2. Computer v Human
3. Human v Human

The 2nd mode allows for the choice of 1 of 3 different AIs, each with a different personality:
1. Sympathetic
2. Indifferent
3. Cruel and Unusual

### Language and Design
Tic Tac Toe is written in C using an ADT (or class-esque) style of design.

### Authors and Contributors
@abethcrane wrote this at the end of 2010, in a spare week right out of high school.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
